creator: Celsius online
descriptionHtml:
--- BRING YOUR CARDS TO LIFE IN THIS NEW CCG ---

Mutants: Genesis is a strategic card game where your creativity and tactical thinking will lead you to victory.
Create your own decks to take on other players in the arena. Summon Mutants and evolve them to gain power.
In cooperation, join forces to defeat legendary Bosses and reap the rewards.
Are you ready to dominate the leaderboard?

--- FIND YOUR STYLE OF PLAY ---

Create your own deck with over two hundred cards divided between 6 unique genes and your best combinations of Mutants, Support Cards and Buildings to make your mark on the legend. Your mastery of deckbuilding and your ability to think on your feet will be your greatest assets!

--- REPLAY YOUR CHAMPION TITLE EVERY MONTH ---

You're not the only one who wants to become the world's best Psycog!
Claim your place among the Seasonal Champions by climbing the 8 ranks of ranked mode in dynamic seasons with regular balancing patches. Rewards and glory await those who dominate the rankings.

--- PLAY CO-OP WITH UP TO 3 PLAYERS ---

In PvE mode, prepare for titanic boss battles with 2 other players simultaneously, and take on the weekly challenges of the Temporal Rifts!

--- REWARDING PROGRESSION ---

Unlock cards and rewards through PvP or PvE progression and weekly cooperative challenges. These rewards will allow you to craft new cards to improve your decks.

--- GENES ---

Master technology with the Tech gene. Immerse yourself in a world of relentless innovation, where Mutants repair themselves effortlessly with Self-Repair, and ephemeral Parts offer strategic advantage. With Dual Core, your Mutants will attack and use their abilities in a single turn, but beware of backlash!

The Necro gene has turned death and decay into powerful allies. Necro mutants thrive on executing enemies or with their Last Wills, leaving a haunted legacy when they're gone. Manipulate Bones, a unique resource, to strengthen your forces. With the Necro gene, death isn't the end; it's a new beginning.

The art of precision and well-crafted combat is brought to life with the Blades gene. Blade Mutants activate unique Tactics based on specific conditions to trigger powers. Equip Orbs to enhance your mutants' abilities and trigger dynamic effects with Draw. Individually powerful mutants and impressive effects are the key to Blades!

Immerse yourself in the wild world of the Zoo gene, where the principles of Darwinian evolution and wilderness reign supreme... Zoo mutants rush into battle, unleashing powerful effects as they enter, and evolve rapidly through the ranks, unlocking new possibilities with each advancement. Embrace Adaptation and navigate the unpredictability of the wilderness.

After conquering the stars, it's time to turn your gaze back to the battlefield with the Space gene. The cohesion of your Squads and Buildings forms the heart of your army. Deploy your troops meticulously to quickly establish an indestructible front. It's time to impose your will in the Arena!

The secrets of the Arcane are revealed with the Mystic Gene, where mythical creatures and magical entities come to life. Mystic Mutants harness super-powered active abilities, creating a symphony of mystical powers that transcend the ordinary. Inflict damage over time with Burn and manipulate the battlefield by blocking abilities with Stasis. In Mystic Gene, magic and strategic mastery intertwine for an explosive gameplay experience.

Download Mutants: Genesis now!
descriptionShort: Join the next generation of Psycogs and climb the ranks to become a legend!

rated.label: Everyone 10+
rated.learnMoreHtmlLink:
Fantasy violence, Mild blood, Mild language
In-game purchases (includes random items)
Learn more

title:
Mutants: Genesis
0.6.14

creator: Celsius online
descriptionHtml:
** Mutants: Genesis' first major update is live now! **

From July 17th to October 9th, 2024, discover 6 new corporations, coming with new cards, new rewards, new skin packs and card backs! One corporation, and its Champion, will be released every 2 weeks.

As the new leader of the Panakeia team, you will have to travel around the world to compete in the Xtrem Mutants Junior League. This will introduce you to new cards, corporations, gene specific strategies and, of course, new Champions to face off against.

--- BRING YOUR CARDS TO LIFE IN THIS NEW CCG ---

Download Mutants: Genesis now!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
After a successful two-year stint in Early Access on PC, Celsius Online is delighted to officially launch Mutants: Genesis on the Google Play Store. This strategic and competitive card game has reached version 1.0 and is now accessible to mobile gamers. Enter a new era of online trading card games, designed for thrilling action and immersive visuals, offering a vibrant and seamless cross-platform experience.
A card game... where cards really come to life!
